oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Alford, George W., 1834 August 16
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of George W. Alford, dated August 16th, 1834. Illustrates the first page of the document. The notation on the verso: “recorded in book No. 10, page 401 & examined.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alford family
